thread.title: Lena Dunham Is Not Here For People Praising Her Weight Loss
thread.title_full: Lena Dunham Is Not Here For People Praising Her Weight Loss

author: Ellie Bate
title: Lena Dunham Is Not Here For People Praising Her Weight Loss
text:
ID: 10720101 5. Headlines all over the world praised Lena for her “dramatic weight loss”, calling the change “shocking” and “incredible” and encouraging readers to “check out her transformation”. View this image › 
Mail Online / The Sun / InTouch Weekly / Daily Star ID: 10720116 6. And Lena was, to put it simply, not here for it. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10720139 7. In an Instagram post thanking Refinery29 for publishing an article titled “People Need To Stop Talking About Lena Dunham’s Weight”, she explained why she rejects the claim that her weight loss is “a triumph”: View this image › 
Instagram / instagram.com ID: 10720149 8. “My weight loss isn’t a triumph and it also isn’t some sign I’ve finally given in to the voices of trolls,” she wrote . “Because my body belongs to ME – at every phase, in every iteration, and whatever I’m doing with it.” Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @lenadunham “I refuse to celebrate these bullshit before-and-after pictures,” Lena continued. “Don’t we have infinitely more pressing news to attend to?”
ID: 10720164 9. People in the comments totally loved Lena for speaking so candidly about the issue. View this image › 
Instagram ID: 10720183 10. And some people even shared stories of similar experiences to Lena’s. View this image › 
Instagram ID: 10720184 11. But mostly people were just sharing the love. View this image › 
Instagram ID: 10720226 12. Well said and thanks for always being honest, Lena. 🏻 ID: 10720229 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
  More News About Lena Dunham Ellie Bate is a celebrity reporter at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
